BIS_fnc_assignPlayerRole.description: Ensures the player can only get in the specific vehicle role.

BIS_fnc_ctrlTextHeight.description: Resize control according to it's text.

BIS_fnc_isLocalized.description: Checks if string is localized. Obsolete variant before isLocalized command was introduced.

BIS_fnc_dbClassIndex.description: Returns indexes leading to given class. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - List of index values

BIS_fnc_posUTMToDeg.description: Generate Lat and Long fields from UTM Zone, Easting and Northing. It uses NAD83 constants.

BIS_fnc_randomPos.description: Selects random position according to given params within given area

BIS_fnc_dbValueId.description: Converts string to value definition. Parameter(s): _this: STRING (converts to) or _this select 0: STRING (converts from) Returns: STRING */

BIS_fnc_numberText.description: Convert a number into string (avoiding scientific notation). It's very imprecise with larger numbers. See example 1.

BIS_fnc_dbImportXML.description: Import XML file into Scripted Database.

systemOfUnits.description: Returns the currently selected system of units.

BIS_fnc_wpFormation.description: FORMATION custom waypoint. Player must stay within certain radius and angle towards followed vehicle.

BIS_fnc_GC.description: Sends an entity to the garbage collection queue. Replaces Arma 2 Garbage Collector.

BIS_fnc_wpLand.description: Let group members land at the waypoint position.

setTrafficDistance.description: Set maximum ambient traffic draw distance (in 2D).

BIS_fnc_posDegtoUTM.description: Generate a UTM Zone, Easting and Northing from lat and long fields. It uses NAD83 constants.

setBatteryChargeRTD.description: Set the actual battery charge of a helicopter.

BIS_fnc_wpCheckpoint.description: CHECKPOINT custom waypoint. Player has to reach waypoint position with certain precisoon (as opposed to normal Move waypoint, which became completed in around 500m).

BIS_fnc_playerName.description: Return current profile's name. Deprecated since Arma 3, use profileName instead.

BIS_fnc_wpHover.example: [player, position dude, 10, 10, false, -1, true] spawn BIS_fnc_wpLand;
BIS_fnc_wpHover.description: HOVER custom waypoint. Hover on specific spot.

BIS_fnc_counter.description: /* Description: Modify the given counter (create it if doesn't exist) Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING - variable name of counter ARRAY in format [variableName,nameSpace], where nameSpace can be object, group or missionNameSpace/uiNameSpace _this select 1 (Optional): NUMBER - added value _this select 2 (Optional): NUMBER - modulo value Returns: NUMBER - counter's value */

BIS_fnc_posDegToUTM.description: Generate a UTM Zone, Easting and Northing from lat and long fields. It uses NAD83 constants.

BIS_fnc_saveGame.description: Evaluates the current battlefield situation and saves the game when appropriate.

BIS_fnc_worldArea.description: Creates (or returns if it already exists) trigger with size of map.

BIS_fnc_markerCreate.description: /* Description: Creates marker with given params. Reads config to recognize settings - use for quick debugging only. Parameter(s): _this: ARRAY of values: STRING - one of type, color, brush or shape. If no corresponding class is found, value is used as marker text ARRAY [STRING(,ANY,ANY,...)] - marker name with optional arguments [NUMBER] - marker size [a,a] [NUMBER,NUMBER] - marker size [x,y] [NUMBER,NUMBER,NUMBER] - marker position [x,y,z] OBJECT - object's position NUMBER - marker dir BOOL - marker locality (true if global) Returns: STRING - created marker */

BIS_fnc_numberDigits.description: Break number into array of digits.

BIS_fnc_dbValueReturn.description: Returns content of given value. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - Value content */

BIS_fnc_dbisValue.description: Checks if string is value definition. Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING Returns: BOOLEAN */

ropeSetCargoMass.description: Set the simulated mass of an object attached to a rope.

setThrottleRTD.description: Set the throttle for the given engine(s) of a helicopter.

BIS_fnc_onEnd.description: Register code to be executed after mission end.

BIS_fnc_kbTell.example: ["01_Wave", "A_in", nil, "SIDE", nil, nil, 1, false] spawn BIS_fnc_kbTell;
BIS_fnc_kbTell.syntax: [topic, container, section, radioMode, code, speakers, soundVolume, radioProtocol] spawn BIS_fnc_kbTell
BIS_fnc_kbTell.description: Play given sentence/conversation. Script terminates itself when conversation is finished.

BIS_fnc_displayColorGet.description: Loads custom color settings from CfgUIDefault. If variables are not stored in profileNamespace yet, function will declare them.

profileNamespace.description: Returns the global namespace attached to the active user profile. Use setVariable and getVariable to save and load data to and from this Namespace. A variable can be deleted by setting its value to nil. By default the variables set in this namespace will exist while the game is running. In order to make variables save permanently, use saveProfileNamespace before the game is over. The variables are stored next to the user profile in a file named myUsername.vars.GAMENAME (e.g. in the My Documents\Take On Helicopters folder).

BIS_fnc_dbValueIndex.description: Returns indexes leading to given value. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - List of index values */

BIS_fnc_camFollow.example: _camera = "camera" camCreate ((getPos player) vectorAdd [0,0,3]); [_camera, player, -2] call BIS_fnc_camFollow;
BIS_fnc_camFollow.description: Refresh a camera Field of View according to its distance with the target.

radioChannelAdd.description: Add the units to the custom radio channel.

BIS_fnc_overviewAuthor.description: Returns the mission author's name preceded by , e.g "by Username". See Description.ext/author.

BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach.example: [player, dude, 50, 10, {hintC "You lost the cargo!"}, 1000] spawn BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach;
BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach.description: ATTACH SLINGLOAD custom waypoint. Load an object to rope.

BIS_fnc_displayName.description: Return given class displayName value. Return base class name if displayName not defined.

BIS_fnc_dbClassRemove.description: /* Description: Remove class from Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if class was removed */

radioChannelCreate.description: Create a custom radio channel with the given color, label, call sign and registered characters. The index returned can be used to manipulate the created channel later. There are 10 slots for custom radio channels which would correspond to channels 6-15 (see getPlayerChannel). The command will find an unused index in this range and create it when found. Server only.

BIS_fnc_dbValueCheck.description: Check if value exists Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if value exists */

BIS_fnc_overviewTimeTrial.description: Returns the dynamically composed overview text for Time Trial scenarios.

BIS_fnc_GUIgrid.description: /* Author: Karel Moricky Description: Returns grid params and stores it into uiNameSpace Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING - category name _this select 1: STRING - grid name Returns: ARRAY - format [[x,y,w,h],gridW,gridH] */

setRotorBrakeRTD.description: Toggle a helicopter's rotor brake on or off.

BIS_fnc_singleMissionConfig.description: Returns config of current single mission.

BIS_fnc_wpWinchLoad.example: [player, dude, 50, 5, 1, rescuer, {hintC "Rescuer died!"}, {hintC "Dude saved"}] spawn BIS_fnc_wpWinchLoad;
BIS_fnc_wpWinchLoad.description: WINCH LOAD custom waypoint. Load a group into helicopter cargo using winch.

enableCoPilot.description: Toggles availability of the actions related to copilots (taking over controls, suspending controls, etc.).

BIS_fnc_paramIn.description: See BIS_fnc_param. Overloading default values is disabled in this variant. It's intended to be used where _this is not used as an input param.

BIS_fnc_spawnVehicle.description: Function to spawn a certain vehicle type with all crew (including turrets). The vehicle can either become part of an existing group or create a new group.

setActualCollectiveRTD.description: Sets the collective pitch control to a specific position, regardless of input devices (until those are changed).

BIS_fnc_wpFastRope.description: FAST-ROPE custom waypoint. Let everybody in vehicles' cargo space rappel down on a rope.

BIS_fnc_kbSkip.description: /* Description: Skip conversation. Currently played sentence will be finished Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING - Topic name _this select 1 (Optional): STRING - container name (default: current mission ID) Returns: NUMBER */

BIS_fnc_spawnGroup.example: Spawn five random EAST units at aPos: [ getPos aPos, EAST, 5] call BIS_fnc_spawnGroup
BIS_fnc_spawnGroup.syntax: [position, side, character details, relative positions, list of ranks, skill range, ammo count range, randomization controls, azimuth] call BIS_fnc_spawnGroup
BIS_fnc_spawnGroup.description: Function which handles the spawning of a dynamic group of characters. The composition of the group can be passed to the function. Alternatively a number can be passed and the function will spawn that amount of characters with a random type. A side's Center must have been created before a group may be spawned. Either by using createCenter or an editor placed (0% Probability of Presence is fine) unit of the appropriate side.

BIS_fnc_dbValueSet.description: Add value to Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path _this select 2: ARRAY - Value Returns: BOOLEAN - True if value was added */

BIS_fnc_radioSetChannel.description: /* Description: Set a specific or random music channel. Parameter(s): _this select 0: channel (String) _this select 1: next (Bool) _this select 2: override (Bool) Returns: Bool */

BIS_fnc_help.description: Shows Function Library viewer, which contains list of all available functions, both official and unofficial.

BIS_fnc_dbValueRemove.description: Remove value from Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if value was removed */

setBrakesRTD.description: Enable landing gear wheel brakes for a helicopter.

BIS_fnc_position.description: Returns PositionAGL, unless passed argument is Array, then the same array is returned. When position is Object and alternative position is stored in "BIS_fnc_position_forced" variable on this object, the stored position is used rather than actual object position.

BIS_fnc_dbClassSet.description: Add class to Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if class was added */

radioChannelSetCallSign.description: Set the custom radio channel's call sign. Available special parameters:

BIS_fnc_shakeGauges.description: /* Description: Shake analogue gauges Parameter(s): _this select 0 (Optional): NUMBER - shake limit (max distance gauges can move on screen from original position) _this select 1 (Optional): NUMBER - number of repeats _this select 2 (Optional): NUMBER - delay between every position change _this select 3 (Optional): ARRAY - list of IDCs Returns: NOTHING */

BIS_fnc_moveIn.description: Moves a unit into vehicle. Compatible with assignedVehicleRole output.

BIS_fnc_kbTellLocal.description: Play given sentence, disable radio and/or lower sounds. Will use BIS_fnc_showSubtitle for better effects if channel is DIRECT or VEHICLE.

getHitPointDamage.description: Return current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its config class). If you need to get damage of a selection instead of hit point, use getHit.

BIS_fnc_wpTransport.description: TRANSPORT custom waypoint. Player must pick up group of units in their location. Get in AI pathfinding is supressed (to avoid unwanted behaviour on building roofs), units are teleported into player's vehicle instead.

BIS_fnc_kbIsSpeaking.description: Check if speaker is locked for different conversation.

BIS_fnc_setHeight.example: // will place player's vehicle on "myHeightMarker", 50m above terrain [vehicle player, 50, getMarkerPos "myHeightMarker", "ATL"]]] call BIS_fnc_setHeight;

setStarterRTD.description: Toggle the starter for the given helicopter engine(s) on or off.

setCustomWeightRTD.description: Add virtual custom weight to a helicopter's center of gravity. This can be used to simulate added internal payload for specific scenarios, and affects the flight model.

BIS_fnc_helicopterSeatMove.description: Plays cockpit animation. Take On Helicopters only.

BIS_fnc_errorMsg.example: ["This is an error message"] call BIS_fnc_errorMsg;

BIS_fnc_helicopterDamage.description: Handling EH-based helicopter damage, event handler in question being Dammagedsic.

BIS_fnc_overviewMission.description: #define CONTROL_SHOW(CONTROL) \ CONTROL ctrlshow true; \ CONTROL ctrlsetfade 0; \ CONTROL ctrlcommit 0; #define CONTROL_HIDE(CONTROL) \ CONTROL ctrlshow false; \ CONTROL ctrlsetfade 1; \ CONTROL ctrlcommit 0;

BIS_fnc_ambientBlacklistAdd.description: /* Description: Add a new ambient blacklist trigger Parameter(s): _this select 0: OBJECT - trigger Returns: BOOL - true when added correctly */

BIS_fnc_HUDLimits.example: [[0,0,0], [1, 0, 50], [0,0,0]] call BIS_fnc_HUDLimits; // limits altitude on HUD to 50m max
BIS_fnc_HUDLimits.description: Set helicopter advanced flight model HUD limits and prevents overwriting existing values. See also setHUDMovementLevels.

BIS_fnc_genericSentence.description: Play generic sentence with probablity set by bis_genericSentenceMode variable (0.5 = 50%, 1 = 100%)

assignAsCargoIndex.description: Assigns the character to a specific cargo / passenger index of the given vehicle.

BIS_fnc_kbPriority.description: /* Description: Set conversation priority. Conversations with priority not in the list won't be played Parameter(s): _this: ARRAY - List of priorities. Empty array will just return current value. NUMBER >0 - add priority to already existing list <0 - remove priority from already existing list Priority 0 cannot be tempered with Returns: ARRAY - List of priorities */

BIS_fnc_roundDir.description: Round direction to nearest set rounding; used for determining cardinal direction.

BIS_fnc_keypointsExportFromKML.description: /* Description: Imports and marks positions from KLM file. Parameter(s): _this: STRING - path to .kml file Returns: STRING - config output (also copied to clipboard) */

setTrafficSpeed.description: Set ambient traffic speed in a rectangle (in kilometers per hour).

BIS_fnc_displayColorSet.description: Applies custom color settings to given Display. Display must be already using color macros, function will just refresh the values according to current color settings.

BIS_fnc_guiMessage.syntax: [message, (header, position, isCancel, parent, pause)] call BIS_fnc_guiMessage;
BIS_fnc_guiMessage.description: Shows customized native message box to user

BIS_fnc_displayControls.description: /* Description: Return all controls of given display class Parameter(s): _this select 0: CONFIG - display config _this select 1: NUMBER or CONFIG or STRING - type of returned values (control configs, their names or IDCs; default: configfile)) _this select 2: BOOL - true to search content of controls group (default: true) Returns: ARRAY */

BIS_fnc_onLoad.description: Register code to be executed after a mission load (from a save, for example).

BIS_fnc_helicopterGetHitpoints.description: Return all hitpoints for a helicopter.

radioChannelSetLabel.description: Set the custom radio channel's label.

BIS_fnc_wpSteady.example: [ player, position dude, nil, [15,1.3,30], 10, {hintC "You failed";}, {hint "Watch out!";}, {hint "Good";} ] spawn BIS_fnc_wpSteady;
BIS_fnc_wpSteady.description: FLY STEADY custom waypoint. Keep helicopter's pitch, bank, relative velocity a relative vector in given limits

radioChannelRemove.description: Remove the units from the custom radio channel.

BIS_fnc_dbClassId.description: Converts string to class definition. Parameter(s): _this: STRING (converts to) or _this select 0: STRING (converts from) Returns: STRING */

BIS_fnc_singleMissionName.description: Returns name of currently selected single mission.

numberOfEnginesRTD.description: Returns the number of engines a helicopter has.

collectiveRTD.description: Returns the current position of a helicopter's collective pitch control.

BIS_fnc_displayMission.description: Returns main display of current mission/intro/outro. A cleaner alternative to findDisplay 46.

BIS_fnc_animType.description: Function that returns a categorized array using a single string with the animation name.

batteryChargeRTD.description: Returns the current charge of a helicopter's batteries.

HUDMovementLevels.description: Returns movement borders for HUD [min speed, max speed, min alt, max alt, min dir, max dir, position[x,y,z] or target]

BIS_fnc_wpAngle.example: [ player, position dude, 250, 60 1, 45 {alive dude}, "Spotted: %1%2" ] spawn BIS_fnc_wpAngle;
BIS_fnc_wpAngle.description: CIRCLE custom waypoint. Keep helicopter rotated in given vector toward target.

BIS_fnc_GUIhint.description: /* Description: Creates advanced hintC dialog Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY in format [text,picture] * text: STRING - hint text * picture: STRING - picture [item1,item2...] - Listbox item ARRAYs in format [itemText,itemDescription,picture,icon] * itemText: STRING - Text displayed in listbox * itemDescription (Optional): STRING - text displayed after clicking on item * picture (Optional): STRING - picture displayed after clicking on item * icon (Optional): STRING - icon displayed in listbox left from text _this select 1 (Optional): STRING - hint header _this select 2 (Optional): ARRAY - [STRING,CODE,NUMBER] - text on left button (when "", button is hidden), code executed upon clicking and fade out delay. If only text is present, button is disabled. _this select 3 (Optional): ARRAY - [STRING,CODE,NUMBER] - STRING - text on right button and code executed upon clicking _this select 4 (Optional): ARRAY - [STRING,CODE,NUMBER] - STRING - text on middle button and code executed upon clicking _this select 5 (Optional): NUMBER or ARRAY - width or [width,height] of picture (in grid coordinates). Width > 17 means only picture is used. Returns: ARRAY - [endState(,lbId)] * endState: NUMBER - 1 when clicked on right button, -1 when clicked on left button, 0 when escaped * lbId: NUMBER - selected listbox item (when listbox was used) */ #define DISPLAY_CLASS 'Hsim_RscDisplayCommonHint_guiHint' #define DISPLAY_CONFIG (configfile >> "RscDisplayCommonHint") #define DISPLAY (uinamespace getvariable DISPLAY_CLASS) #define CONTROL (DISPLAY displayctrl _idc) #define CONTROL_FADEINTIME 0.3 #define CONTROL_FADEIN \ CONTROL ctrlsetfade 1; \ CONTROL ctrlcommit 0; \ CONTROL ctrlsetfade 0; \ CONTROL ctrlcommit CONTROL_FADEINTIME;

saveProfileNamespace.description: Saves the variables stored in profileNamespace to the persistent active user profile.

BIS_fnc_dbPrint.description: Copy Scripted Database content into clipboard for evaluation. Text will be formatted as config. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: NUMBER (optional) - Number of tabs Returns: STRING - printed text */

BIS_fnc_dbClassReturn.description: Returns content of given class. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - Class content */

BIS_fnc_dbClassList.description: Returns all classes withing class. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - List of classnames */

setEngineRPMRTD.description: Instantly set a helicopter's engine RPMs to the given value.

BIS_fnc_KMLimport.description: Read positions from a KML file.

BIS_fnc_MP (Take On Helicopters).example: ["Imma spamming your log!","BIS_fnc_log"] call BIS_fnc_MP; Logs a message for every player who's currently joined.
BIS_fnc_MP (Take On Helicopters).syntax: [params, functionName, target, isSpawn, isPersistent] call BIS_fnc_MP;
BIS_fnc_MP (Take On Helicopters).description: Send function for remote execution (and executes locally if conditions are met) .

setHitPointDamage.description: Set the current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its config class).

setAPURTD.description: Let the Auxiliary Power Unit (APU) reach a desired state over the given period of time.

setBatteryRTD.description: Toggle a helicopter's electrical systems on and off.

BIS_fnc_convertUnits.syntax: [value, from, to, mode, precision] call BIS_fnc_convertUnits
BIS_fnc_convertUnits.description: Converts values to a target system of units.

BIS_fnc_dbValueList.description: Returns all values withing class. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: ARRAY - List of value names */

setTrafficDensity.description: Set the density of ambient cars in a rectangle (in cars per kilometer).

BIS_fnc_helicopterSeat.description: Check if unit sits on right or left seat.

enableAutoStartUpRTD.description: Toggle availability of the automated helicopter start-up and shutdown sequences.

BIS_fnc_ambientBlacklist.description: /* Description: Check if area is blacklisted. Blacklist triggers are to be named 'bis_ambientBlacklist_#', where # is number from 0 to 99. Parameter(s): _this select 0: BIS_fnc_position compatible position - check if position is blacklisted NUMBER - initialize blacklisted areas Returns: BOOL - true when in blacklisted area */

BIS_fnc_wpRestricted.description: RESTRICTED custom waypoint. Player must fly in given limits.

BIS_fnc_selectRandom.example: _bestShooter = [_rento, _ben, _trit] call BIS_fnc_selectRandom; //returns one of the variables _bestSeries = [["halo1","halo2"],["ofp","arma2"]] call BIS_fnc_selectRandom; //returns one of the arrays
BIS_fnc_selectRandom.description: Selects one of the arguments at random. There is now a dedicated script command selectRandom, use that instead.

BIS_fnc_secondsToString.example: hint format ["Hi, it is currently %1.", [time, "HH:MM"] call BIS_fnc_secondsToString];

BIS_fnc_kbMenu.description: /* Description: Opens conversation menu. Script terminates itself when menu selection is finished. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY or STRING - List of responses (of type ARRAY) or Menu name Responses are in format: _response select 0: STRING or ANY - Display name when STRING, otherwise used as default option when menu is closed without selecting anything. _response select 1: STRING - expression ARRAY - BIS_fnc_kbTell params Returns: NUMBER - ID of select option */

BIS_fnc_radioSetPlaylist.description: Set a random music playlist for the current set channel (default "Rock"). Musics with "genre" set in CfgMusic are selected and shuffled.

ropeDetach.description: Detach a rope from an object.

BIS_fnc_dbClassCheck.description: Check if class exists Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if class exists */

BIS_fnc_kbCanSpeak.description: Check if person is not locked by some conversation.

setTrafficGap.description: Set the average gap between ambient cars in a rectangle (in meters).

setWantedRPMRTD.description: Tell the helicopter engine RPMs to reach the given value within a period of time. The simulation will try to reach the RPMs, but it does not guarantee it will reach the precise value!

BIS_fnc_wpTimed.description: COUNTDOWN custom waypoint. Player has to reach waypoint area before time runs out.

BIS_fnc_credits.description: Opens credits, identical to those found in main menu (Arma 3). Present in Arma 3.

isPiPEnabled.description: Returns whether Picture-In-Picture video option is enabled or not.

BIS_fnc_posDegToWorld.description: Convert latitude/longtitude coordinates into game world position.

BIS_fnc_randomPosTrigger.description: Selects random position within trigger, marker, location area or area defined by array

BIS_fnc_radioSetTrack.description: /* Description: Set a specific or random music track. Parameter(s): _this select 0: track (String) _this select 1: override (Bool) _this select 2: Bool (first track? -> start randomly within the track) Returns: Array (duration (s): Scalar, start time (s): Scalar) */

ropeCreate.syntax: ropeCreate [fromObject, fromPoint, toObject, toPoint, segments, length]
ropeCreate.description: Create a rope (PhysX rope in Arma 3).

BIS_fnc_markerParams.description: Returns marker params in format compatible with BIS_fnc_markerCreate.

BIS_fnc_dbImportConfig.description: Copy config classes and adds them to Scripted Database. Parameter(s): _this select 0: ARRAY - Database array _this select 1: ARRAY - Path _this select 2: CONFIG - Config path Returns: BOOLEAN - True if copied */

throttleRTD.description: Return the current throttle level for all engines of a helicopter.

BIS_fnc_dbisClass.description: Checks if string is class definition. Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING Returns: BOOLEAN */

BIS_fnc_halt.example: ["You are now supposed to be %1",rank player] call bis_fnc_halt;
BIS_fnc_halt.description: Halts current function and all it's parents and logs an error message.

BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadDetach.description: DETACH SLINGLOAD custom waypoint. Unload an object which was previously loaded using BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach

BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadDrop.description: DROP SLINGLOAD custom waypoint. Drop an object which was previously loaded using BIS_fnc_wpSlingLoadAttach

getAllEnvSoundControllers.description: Returns an array containing the names and values of environmental variables that can be used in simple expressions when configuring sounds.

BIS_fnc_moveAction.example: _actionName = [player, false] call BIS_fnc_moveAction; _actionConfig = [player, true] call BIS_fnc_moveAction;
BIS_fnc_moveAction.description: Return current move action (used in playAction, playActionNow and switchAction)

itemCargo.description: Get array with items from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container).

BIS_fnc_moduleFriendlyFire.example: _ret = ["Init", [[ BIS_vip1, BIS_vip2, BIS_noVip], true]] call BIS_fnc_moduleFriendlyFire
BIS_fnc_moduleFriendlyFire.description: Handles the friendly fire. Use either the module interface in the editor, or call individual functions.

setObjectMaterial.description: Sets material of object selection. The selection number is defined through the hiddenselection[]={} array in the vehicle's config (starting with 0).

commandArtilleryFire.description: Orders a unit to reload defined magazine commence fire burst on the given position (via the radio).

timeMultiplier.description: Returns the value set with setTimeMultiplier.

addScoreSide.description: Adds side score. This is shown in the MP score tab as the total score. MP Only. Server execution only.

isSimpleObject.description: Returns true if given object is simple object

BIS_fnc_jukebox.description: Plays music, depending on the player group status.

BIS_fnc_healing.description: Healing postprocess. Supposed to give healing postprocess effects.

BIS_fnc_ORBATConfigPreview.description: Opens config viewer and shows CfgORBAT. Used to retrieve CfgOrbat data

handgunWeapon.description: Returns the name of a unit's handgun (an empty string if there is none).

setPlateNumber.description: Change the license plates on any vehicle which has plates configured. Max 15 characters are allowed!

BIS_fnc_curatorAutomatic.description: Spawn units based on curator settings. Used when curator role is not taken.

ctSetHeaderTemplate.description: Takes config path to the new header template. Clears the whole RscControlsTable and sets the new header template.

setWindDir.description: Changes the wind direction smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero means there will be an immediate change.

BIS_fnc_exportCfgGroups.description: Export group or object composition for use in CfgGroups. The result will be copied to clipboard.

BIS_fnc_getParamValue.description: Returns the value of mission param given by the class name. This function is global and will return selected param value on any PC including JIP. For backward compatibility it also supports "param1" and "param2".

remoteExecutedOwner.description: Returns clientOwner of the PC, which initiated Remote Execution call. If used in SP or outside of remote executed context, the command returns 0. To check if the context was remote executed or remote executed from JIP queue, use isRemoteExecuted and isRemoteExecutedJIP

BIS_fnc_executeStackedEventHandler.description: This function executes the stacked items.

unitAimPositionVisual.description: Returns the position on the unit other units can aim at in render scope. See also aimPos, unitAimPosition.

goggles.description: Returns name of currently used goggles (for NVGoggles use hmd).

ctrlSetChecked.description: Sets checked state of a checkbox in checkboxes control (CT_CHECKBOXES type 7 of Dialog Control). Since Arma 3 v1.71.141591 it is possible to check checkbox with given index in multiple checkboxes set-up. For more information see DialogControls-CheckBoxes.

simulWeatherSync.description: Synchronizes Simul Weather with Arma weather, generates all keyframes.

isUIContext.description: Returns true if the script originated from some UI control event, for example from "onButtonDown" EH. Exists within parent scope and immediate child scopes.

load.description: Returns current sum of mass from items stored in all unit's containers. Load is calculated by the following formula: _loadPlayer = loadAbs player / getNumber (configFile >> "CfgInventoryGlobalVariable" >> "maxSoldierLoad");

BIS_fnc_ordinalNumber.example: _second = [42] call BIS_fnc_ordinalNumber; // will return "42nd" for English-speaking players
BIS_fnc_ordinalNumber.description: Return number as ordinal number (e.g. 1 become "1st")

BIS_fnc_objectFromNetId.description: Extends MP-only objectFromNetId functionality to SP

BIS_fnc_isThrowable.description: Returns true if given magazine is throwable

BIS_fnc_diagKey.description: Tracks pressed keys. (getNumber (missionConfigFile >> "diagKey") > 0) has to be true.

BIS_fnc_finishCuratorChallenge.description: Handle repeated curator challenges. When rewards defined in the argument are exceeded, refilling points bar fill be offered instead. Number of challenges can be retrieved by

BIS_fnc_traceBullets.description: Visualise unit's bullet trajectories. Can only be used on one shooter in a single instance.

setCustomAimCoef.description: Set custom aim precision coefficient for weapon sway

soldierMagazines.description: Get array with all magazines of the given unit.

BIS_fnc_feedbackInit.description: Init function for feedback system. Declaration of variables, eventhandlers, etc. for in-game effects. Engine use only.

BIS_fnc_removeScriptedEventHandler.description: Removes scripted event handler with given name and id. Additionally "ScriptedEventHandlerRemoved" scripted EH is called. For the list of available scripted event handlers see Arma 3: Event Handlers/ScriptedEventHandlers

setSimpleTaskType.description: Attach type to the simple task. See Default Task Types.

BIS_fnc_missionRespawnType.description: Return respawn type defined in Description.ext. Can return as Number (e.g 1) or String (e.g "BIRD").

taskType.description: Returns the type of the given task

setFatigue.description: Sets the person's fatigue, from 0 to 1.

BIS_fnc_codePerformance.description: Measures how much time it takes to execute given expression. Results may vary based on overall performance.

set3DENGrid.description: Sets the grid increment for the given transformation type.

setTimeMultiplier.description: Sets a time multiplier for in-game time. The command range is now capped at 0.1 - 120 to avoid performance problems.

setStaminaScheme.description: Set stamina bar color. The scheme can be "Normal", "FastDrain", "Exhausted" or "Default".

isLocalized.example: if (isLocalized "STR_DN_SNAKE") then { hint localize "STR_DN_SNAKE"; } else { hint "STR_DN_SNAKE"; };
isLocalized.description: Checks whether given string name is localized.

setLightDayLight.description: Sets if light can be used during the day.

removeMagazineGlobal.description: Removes the magazine from the unit.

compileFinal.description: Compile expression and makes it final, preventing it from:

activatedAddons.description: Returns a list of all activated addons.

BIS_fnc_tridentExecute.description: Execute a code based on Trident relationship.

setCustomWeightRTD.description: Add virtual custom weight to a helicopter's center of gravity. This can be used to simulate added internal payload for specific scenarios, and affects the flight model.

BIS_fnc_diagConfig.description: Prints config entries. Results are printed to debug log and wiki compatible table is copied to clipboard.

BIS_fnc_sideIsEnemy.example: _isEnemy = [west, east] call BIS_fnc_sideIsEnemy; //Checks if EAST is enemy to WEST.
BIS_fnc_sideIsEnemy.description: Determines if side B is enemy to side A the way the game engine does it. The relationship table can be found here: Side relations.

BIS_fnc_textTiles.example:
[parseText "MyMission
by Username", true, nil, 7, 0.7, 0] spawn BIS_fnc_textTiles
BIS_fnc_textTiles.syntax: [content, position, tileSize, duration, fadeInOutTime, tileTransparency] spawn BIS_fnc_textTiles
BIS_fnc_textTiles.description: Show animated text with background tiles. Can be used to display mission name.

customRadio.description: Sends the message to the custom radio channel. The message is defined in the description.ext file or radio protocol.

modParams.description: Returns list of mod parameters according to given options, values are in same order as the given options. Available options:

BIS_fnc_liveFeedModuleSetSource.description: /* Description: Set a live feed's source via a module. Parameters: _this: OBJECT - Live Feed - Set Source module */ // <insert smart comment about dedicated servers here>

setVelocityModelSpace.description: Sets the velocity (speed vector) of the given vehicle relative to its model.

enableSatNormalOnDetail.description: Enables/Disables satellite normal map od detail maps.

BIS_fnc_addVirtualMagazineCargo.description: Add virtual magazines to an object (e.g., ammo box). Virtual items can be selected in the Arsenal.

uniformContainer.description: Returns a cargo container of a unit's uniform.

isLaserOn.description: Returns true if the vehicle has its laser turned on. Not to be confused with isIRLaserOn which is for units

buldozer_LoadNewRoads.description: Generates new roads. Working only in buldozer.

difficultyEnabledRTD.description: Returns true if rotorlib simulation is enabled. Forcing by mission is included

BIS_fnc_guiEffectTiles.description: Used in dialogs to animate background UAV tiles. See notes for a full working example.

forceAddUniform.description: Create a new uniform and hard link it into slot (without any restrictions).

setLightAttenuation.syntax: light setLightAttenuation [start, constant, linear, quadratic, hardlimitstart, hardlimitend]
setLightAttenuation.description: Sets attenuation of light. Standard method of attenuation (1 / (constant + linear*dist + quadratic*dist*dist)). start param represents distance, where the attenuation starts to take effects (dist = distance - start).

isEqualTypeAll.description: Compares types of all elements of an array to the type of a single value.

shownArtilleryComputer.example: if ( shownArtilleryComputer ) then { hint "Artillery Computer shown on screen"; };
shownArtilleryComputer.description: Checks whether the player has the artillery computer currently open.

setPilotCameraTarget.description: Sets an area or target to be tracked by the object airplane or helicopter pilotCamera. To track an object the vehicle has to have appropriate sensors (scanners) that can detect the given target type. Using objNull will unlock the camera

missionVersion.description: Returns the version of the current mission.

tvSortByValue.description: Sorts children of given item by tvValue from highest to lowest by default. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

BIS_fnc_addToPairs.description: Adds given value to pair array, stored under unique key.

ctrlSetModelDirAndUp.description: Sets orientation of 3D control model. It is similar to setVectorDirAndUp command for an object.

configClasses.description: Returns an array of config entries which meet criteria in condition code.

BIS_fnc_fixDate.description: Checks the array with date data and makes sure, the values are within the boundries.

clearItemCargoGlobal.description: Removes all items from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container).

BIS_fnc_addClassOO.description: Registering a class for the OO scripting shell.

currentWeaponTurret.description: Returns the name of the currently selected weapon on specified turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret.

distanceSqr.description: Computes the squared distance between two objects or positions.

remoteExec.example: // runs hint "hello" on each connected client "hello" remoteExec ["hint"];
remoteExec.description: Asks server to execute given scripted function or script command on given target PC. The environment chosen for the execution is as follows:

BIS_fnc_consolidateArray.description: Finds duplicities in the given array of anything and consolidates them into an array of sub-arrays

ctRowCount.description: Returns number of rows (headers not included) in the RscControlsTable.

BIS_fnc_textureVehicleIcon.description: Checks whether icon is defined in CfgVehicleIcons and if so, returns the icon.

linkItem.example: bluforUnit linkItem "NVGoggles"; opforUnit linkItem "NVGoggles_OPFOR"; independentUnit linkItem "NVGoggles_INDEP";
linkItem.description: Create and assign item to the correct slot. If there is an item in the targeted slot, it gets replaced.

BIS_fnc_getCfgDataPool.description: /* Description: * Get array of attribute values out of the parent config class. * Attributes need to be in this format: "_n", where n is an index number (starting from 0). * If any discrepancy in indexing is detected, loading will stop and only the correctly indexed values will be returned. * Max. index supported is 99. * If more then 9 attributes used, 0-9 need to use leading zeroes. CFG example: class Timeline { class StageA { _0[] = {2035,7,7,04,30}; _1[] = {2035,7,7,06,15}; _2[] = {2035,7,7,18,35}; _3[] = {2035,7,8,09,05}; _4[] = {2035,7,8,13,25}; _5[] = {2035,7,8,17,10}; _6[] = {2035,7,8,21,40}; _7[] = {2035,7,9,19,55}; }; }; Remark(s): * Can by called 2 ways: * 1st way (general) works for any config. * 2nd way is for comfortable working with mission description.ext. Parameter(s): _this: CFG _this: ARRAY of STRINGS - missionConfigFile classes. Example: * 1st way of calling: _array = (configfile >> "BulletBubbles" >> "BulletBubbles1") call BIS_fnc_getCfgData; _array = (missionconfigfile >> "Timeline" >> "StageA") call BIS_fnc_getCfgData; * 2nd way of calling: _array = ["Timeline","StageA"] call BIS_fnc_getCfgData; Returns: ARRAY or nil, if parent class is not found */

getObjectMaterials.description: Gets all custom materials associated with the object.

logEntities.description: Creates a log file containing the list of all game entities in scene.

isUniformAllowed.description: Check whether given uniform can be dressed by target soldier.

getAllHitPointsDamage.description: Returns 3 arrays for easy cross reference: 1st - array of hit point names, 2nd - array of hit selection names, 3rd - array of damage values. All values in all arrays are ordered accordingly to hit part index for convenience and for use in setHitIndex and getHitIndex. Levels of damage are:

BIS_fnc_moduleHQ.description: /* Description: Register or return side HQ speaker Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - register the HQ SIDE - return HQ of the side Returns: OBJECT - the HQ */

BIS_fnc_animateTaskWaypoint.description: Plays an animation that pushes the active task waypoint up and down.

setWaypointForceBehaviour.description: Forces the behavior of waypoint, disables AUTOCOMBAT.

tvSetText.description: Sets string text to item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

setObjectViewDistance.description: Sets the rendering distance of objects (and shadows).

modelToWorldVisualWorld.description: Converts position from object model space to world space in render time.

setMass.description: Changes the mass of an object smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero (or using the alternative syntax) means an immediate change.

getObjectViewDistance.description: Gets the values of rendering distances of objects and shadows.

ctSetCurSel.description: Selects the line with the given index. Will take only rows, but not headers into account. -1 deselects all. Returns Nothing.

briefingName.description: Returns the name of the current briefing/scenario name.

BIS_fnc_diagPreview.description: Previews selected classes from given container.

everyBackpack.description: Returns array of backpacks stored in given crate or vehicle. Used for accessing backpack content of a backpack on ground.

BIS_fnc_enemySides.description: Returns sides hostile to the given side / object.

isRemoteExecuted.description: Returns true if the code context is being remote executed by remoteExec or remoteExecCall. In SP always returns false. See also isRemoteExecutedJIP

animateBay.description: Force animation of bay to given state, -1 for reset to engine handling, can cause weapon inoperative, because weapon is released when bay state =1.

setDriveOnPath.description: Sets the path to follow for AI driver. Note that unitReady will return true even if AI is still driving through the points.

BIS_fnc_taskSetType.description: /* Description: Sets task type to given task. Parameters: 0: STRING - task id 1: STRING - task type Returns: STRING - task id */

BIS_fnc_removeVirtualWeaponCargo.description: Remove virtual weapons from an object (e.g., ammo box). Virtual items can be selected in the Arsenal.

BIS_fnc_romanNumeral.description: Convert integer to roman numeral (e.g. 42 becomes "XLII").

get3DENCamera.example: // set exact yaw, pitch, and roll _y = 45; _p = -80; _r = 0; get3DENCamera setVectorDirAndUp [ [ sin _y * cos _p,cos _y * cos _p,sin _p], [ [ sin _r,-sin _p,cos _r * cos _p],-_y] call BIS_fnc_rotateVector2D ];
get3DENCamera.description: Returns the camera Object used by the Eden Editor.

BIS_fnc_getFromPairs.description: /* Description: Searches the associative array for the 1st occurance of the key string and returns the value associated with it. Syntax: _value = [_associativeArray:array,_key:string,_defaultValue] call BIS_fnc_getFromPairs; Example: 2 = [[["apple",3],["pear",2]],"pear"] call BIS_fnc_getFromPairs; Returns: * if found: value stored under the key * if not found: nil or _defaultValue */

getStamina.description: Get current stamina (~ seconds until depletion)

worldSize.description: Returns config size of the current world. Equivalent to worldName call BIS_fnc_mapSize.

isAbleToBreathe.description: If unit is diving and doesn't have a re-breather, it returns false. Diving means the unit's head is underwater. If unit is underwater and has a re-breather, the command returns true.

tvData.description: Returns string data from item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

getCenterOfMass.description: Returns center of mass of an object.

clearItemCargo.description: Removes all items from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container).

selectRandom.description: Returns a random element from the given array. Engine solution to BIS_fnc_selectRandom

drawTriangle.example: findDisplay 12 displayCtrl 51 ctrlAddEventHandler ["Draw", { _this select 0 drawTriangle [ [ player getRelPos [100, 0], player getRelPos [100, -135], player getRelPos [100, 135] ], [1,0,0,0.5], "#(rgb,1,1,1)color(1,1,1,1)" ]; }];
drawTriangle.description: Draws a single triangle or multiple triangles on the map. Triangle is defined by 3 positions of its verticies: p0, p1, p2 in a single array [p0, p1, p2]. Next 3 positions in the same array [p0, p1, p2, p0, p1, p2] will be used to draw second triangle, another 3 positions [p0, p1, p2, p0, p1, p2, p0, p1, p2] to draw 3rd and so on.

diag_lightNewLoad.description: Allows loading of lightning config during the gameplay (effectively changing the current scene lightning). Filename path can be either absolute or relative. The file must contain only the class LightningNew, which should contain lightning configuration.

BIS_fnc_colorRGBAtoHTML.description: Converts RGBA color format to #AARRGGBB HTML color format.

setVehicleReportOwnPosition.description: Sets that the vehicle will share its own position via datalink to the Side center.

BIS_fnc_moduleTaskSetDescription.description: /* Description: Set Task Description module function */

distance2D.description: Returns a 2D distance (distance projected to X,Y plane) in meters between two Objects or two Positions or Object and Position.

BIS_fnc_removeVirtualMagazineCargo.description: Remove virtual magazines from an object (e.g., ammo box). Virtual items can be selected in the Arsenal.

getPlayerChannel.description: Returns channel number for given player, provided that player is speaking, otherwise -1. Having mic on is not enough, player has to make a sound. There are several limitations to this command:

isRemoteExecutedJIP.description: Returns true if the code context is being remote executed from the JIP queue by remoteExec or remoteExecCall (when JIP param was set). It is a subset of isRemoteExecuted:

targetKnowledge.description: Returns unit's knowledge about target. The returned array includes information whether the target is

setUnitLoadout.example: player_2 setUnitLoadout (getUnitLoadout player_1); // Copies loadout from player_1 and applies it to player_2
setUnitLoadout.description: Creates a loadout from given inventory structure and applies it to a unit. When String for class name is supplied, the command will search CfgVehicles for the given class in order to extract the loadout from config. If Config is given, it will search given config (including mission config) for the loadout information. In either case, the config should contain the following entries, which is standard for any unit class, for example:

waypointsEnabledUAV.example: _uav enableUAVWaypoints false; hint str waypointsEnabledUAV _uav; // returns false
waypointsEnabledUAV.description: Checks if the UAV has waypoints enabled.

BIS_fnc_curatorWaypointPlaced.description: Code executed when curator waypoint is placed.

lbSetSelectColor.description: Sets the select color of the item with the given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to color.

selectRandomWeighted.description: Returns a random element from the given array according to assigned weights. Engine solution to BIS_fnc_selectRandomWeighted. A few notes:

lbSetPictureColor.description: Sets the color of item's picture (left) with the given index of the listbox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given color. Color is in format Color. Color which consists from only zeros means disable this override.

BIS_fnc_moduleEffectsBubbles.description: Creates underwater bubble effect on defined place (called usually by BIS_fnc_moduleEffectsEmitterCreator).

BIS_fnc_drawRespawnPositions.description: Draws respawn positions on the map which were added by BIS_fnc_addRespawnPosition.

isAutotest.description: Returns true if game was started with autotest parameter

BIS_fnc_taskAlwaysVisible.description: Returns true if task is forced to be always visible (default: false).

everyContainer.description: Returns array of all containers (uniforms, vests, backpacks) stored in given crate or vehicle. Used for accessing containers content stored in ammo box or ground holder.

modelToWorldVisual.description: Converts position from object model space to world space in render time scope. For ASL version see modelToWorldVisualWorld.

pitch.description: Returns the pitch of a persons voice.

BIS_fnc_alignTabs.example: [ ["Player:", str player], ["Name:", name player], ["Type:", typeOf player], ["Location:", str getPosATL player], ["Direction:", str getDir player] ] call BIS_fnc_alignTabs;
BIS_fnc_alignTabs.description: Align two columns divided by tabs. A tab counts for 8 characters.

isCollisionLightOn.description: Returns true if vehicle collision lights are on otherwise false.

BIS_fnc_configPath.example: ["configFile >> ""CfgVehicles"" >> ""Car"""] call BIS_fnc_configPath; // ["configFile","CfgVehicles","Car"] [["configFile","CfgVehicles","Car"]] call BIS_fnc_configPath; // bin\config.cpp/CfgVehicles/Car ["bin\config.cpp/CfgVehicles/Car"] call BIS_fnc_configPath; // ["configFile","CfgVehicles","Car"] [configFile >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Car", ""] call BIS_fnc_configPath; // "configFile >> ""CfgVehicles"" >> ""Car"""
BIS_fnc_configPath.description: Returns config path to given entry in given format

setCuratorWaypointCost.description: Sets cost of waypoints (used for placing, editing and deleting).

removeCuratorEditingArea.description: Removes editing area for given curator.

diag_activeSQFScripts.example: [] spawn { hint str diag_activeSQFScripts; }; // displays [["<spawn> hint str diag_activeSQFScripts;", "", true, 1]]
diag_activeSQFScripts.description: Returns information about active SQF scripts.

vectorAdd.example: hint str (velocity unit1 vectorAdd velocity unit2);

BIS_fnc_diagKeyTest.description: Returns all user actions according to mode.

pushBackUnique.description: Adds element to the back of the given array but only if it is unique to the array. The index of the added element is returned upon success, otherwise -1. This command modifies the original array.

BIS_fnc_earthquake.description: Earthquake simulation - now just camera shake and sound. Stamina is impacted by the earthquake too.

BIS_fnc_getVirtualWeaponCargo.description: Get virtual weapons from an object (e.g., ammo box). Virtual items can be selected in the Arsenal.

setSlingLoad.description: Creates sling loading from first object to second object if possible. To unload cargo, pass objNull as second param.

BIS_fnc_diagHit.description: Tracks received wounds. (getNumber (missionConfigFile >> "diagHit") > 0) has to be true.

setPitch.description: Sets the pitch of a persons voice.

commandSuppressiveFire.description: Order the given unit to suppress a given position or target (via the radio).

setAnimSpeedCoef.description: Sets a coefficient for animation speed (0.5 will play animations half the speed, 2 twice the speed).

BIS_fnc_moduleEffectsShells.description: Creates empty ammo cartridges on position of the module logic.

setFlagAnimationPhase.description: Sets flag position on the flag pole according to the given animation phase, where 0 is the bottom of the flag pole, 1 is the top of the flag pole. The changes to the flag position are local to the PC command is executed on. To animate flag use BIS_fnc_animateFlag

BIS_fnc_endMissionServer.description: Ends the mission properly for all players in a multiplayer environment.

BIS_fnc_getCfgDataBool.description: Gets a number defined in config]] and retype it into a boolean. Everything bigger then 0 is true, otherwise it's false.

BIS_fnc_addCuratorIcon.example: [ curatorModule, ["targetIcon.paa", [1,1,1,1], position player, 1, 1, 45, "Target", 1, 0.05, "TahomaB"], false ] call BIS_fnc_addCuratorIcon;
BIS_fnc_addCuratorIcon.description: Add an icon displayed in curator interface.

flagSide.description: Returns Side of the local instance of the flag. A getter for setFlagSide.

screenshot.description: Captures a screenshot and stores it to given filename.

binocular.description: Returns class name of currently used binocular weapon.

BIS_fnc_wpDemine.example: [group player, getMarkerPos "mineField", objNull, false] call BIS_fnc_wpDemine;
BIS_fnc_wpDemine.description: Scripted "CLEAR MINES" Advanced Waypoint. The script needs a unit with the abiility to demine (engineer or explosive specialist trait and a toolkit).

curatorSelected.description: Returns list of all curator selected items.

face.description: Returns the face of a person.

BIS_fnc_startLoadingScreen.example: ["myLoadingScreen", "Loading… wait for my splendid™ mission!"] call BIS_fnc_startLoadingScreen; uiSleep 3; "myLoadingScreen" call BIS_fnc_endLoadingScreen;
BIS_fnc_startLoadingScreen.description: Register a loading screen. Start the loading when it is the first one registered.

allControls.description: Returns a list of all controls for desired existing display. Returned controls also include controls from control groups

BIS_fnc_tridentGetRelationship.description: Description: Get relationship of competing Trident sides. The value slowly decreases towards 0.

isBleeding.example: if (isBleeding player) then { player groupChat "I'm bleeding!!"; }
isBleeding.description: Returns whether the unit is bleeding.

vectorModelToWorldVisual.example: Convert model space vector [0,-10,4] to world space; vector gets rotated according to _airplane: _airplane vectorModelToWorldVisual [0,-10,4];
vectorModelToWorldVisual.description: Converts vector from model to world space in render time scope.

tvSetValue.description: Sets scalar data to item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. If the given value is not integer, it will be converted to integer

BIS_fnc_createRuin.description: Create a building ruin and hide the original object.

BIS_fnc_moduleChat.example: myLogic setVariable ["Channel", "2"]; myLogic setVariable ["Text", "Hello everyone, this is side chat!"]; [myLogic, [player], true] call BIS_fnc_moduleChat;
BIS_fnc_moduleChat.description: Make a list of units use any *chat command (groupChat, vehicleChat, sideChat, commandChat, globalChat).

enablePersonTurret.description: Enables or disables firing from a vehicle cargo position. To get the turret path use assignedVehicleRole or getCargoIndex command.

listVehicleSensors.description: Returns an array of the sensors in the given vehicle's config (configfile >> CfgVehicles >> vehicle >> Components >> SensorsManagerComponent >> Components).

setUserActionText.description: Changes user added action (see addAction) menu item text.

addItemCargoGlobal.description: Creates new items and stores them in the given container. Works with items, weapons and magazines.

isVehicleRadarOn.example: isVehicleRadarOn vehicle player ; // returns true if radar is turned on
isVehicleRadarOn.description: Returns true if vehicle has active sensors on

isFilePatchingEnabled.description: Returns true if file patching is enabled otherwise false

tvSetCurSel.description: Sets cursor to given item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. To deselect all items use [-1] for the path param (available since Arma 3 v1.55.133898)

flagAnimationPhase.description: Returns flag position on the flag pole in range of 0..1, where 0 is bottom of the flag pole, 1 is the top of the flag pole. The result is local to the PC on which command is executed

param.example: [1, 2, 3] call { private _one = param [0, 1]; private _two = param [1, 2]; private _three = param [2, 3]; // ..... };
param.description: Extracts a single value with given index from input argument, similar to BIS_fnc_param. When used without argument, as shown in main syntax, internal variable _this, which is usually available inside functions and event handlers, is used as argument. If input argument is not an array, it will be converted to 1 element array.

move3DENCamera.description: Moves Eden Editor camera to given position, with or without offset.

selectWeaponTurret.description: Selects the given weapon on specified turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret. Since ver. 1.63.136864 this command supports both weapon name and muzzle name.

vectorFromTo.description: Unit vector, equal to direction from vector1 to vector2. In other words this command produces vectorNormalized between given 2 points. To get a normal vector use vectorDiff.

isTutHintsEnabled.description: Returns the status of TUTORIAL HINTS setting in UI (OPTIONS >> GAME >> GENERAL >> TUTORIAL HINTS).

forceRespawn.description: Forces unit to respawn. The effect as if the player pressed RESPAWN button in the game pause menu, the unit is killed only there is no "so and so was killed" message and no score adjustment.

BIS_fnc_showMarkers.description: Show or hide given markers using fade effect.

getObjectDLC.example: _appID = getObjectDLC cursorTarget; if (!isNil "_appID") then { hint format ["This object belongs to DLC with id: %1", _appID]; } else { hint "This object is vanilla"; };
getObjectDLC.description: Returns appID of the DLC the object belongs to or nil if object is vanilla.

removeGoggles.description: Removes goggles from unit (diver goggles for example). This command does not remove NVGoggles. Use unassignItem and removeItem or just unlinkItem for latter.

isEqualTypeAny.description: Compares type of given value to every type in the given array and if match is found, true is returned.

BIS_fnc_briefingAnimate.example: // given you have 6 markers: // - "myMarker" // - "myMarker_0" // - "myMarker_1" // - "myMarker_2" // - "myMarker_3" // - "myMarker_4" for "_i" from 0 to 4 do { private _commit = 1; ["myMarker", 5, _commit] call BIS_fnc_briefingAnimate; sleep _commit; };

BIS_fnc_param.description: Load a script parameter. See Functions Library (Arma 3) for detailed description.

ctrlSetAngle.description: Sets the rotation of an ST_PICTURE control. Rotation will be done within the control boundaries, so if the X and Y are given off center, the picture may get clipped by the control boundaries. Doesn't require ctrlCommit. Procedural textures filled controls do not rotate.

set3DENMissionAttributes.example: set3DENMissionAttributes [["Multiplayer","respawn",3],["Multiplayer","respawnDelay",10]]; Set respawn type to 3 and respawn delay to 10 seconds

synchronizedWaypoints.description: Returns the list of waypoints synchronized with a given trigger or waypoint.

BIS_fnc_validateParametersOO.description: Validating the parameters of a certain method in a class.

addMagazineAmmoCargo.description: Adds magazines with specified ammo count to the cargo space of a vehicle or a container.

addMissionEventHandler.example: // A script could be executed to stop custom scripts graciously, or save progress & stats, for example: _id = addMissionEventHandler ["Ended",{ _this execVM "missionEnded.sqf" }];
addMissionEventHandler.description: Adds event handler (EH) attached to the current mission and returns EH handle. If EH has some data to return upon event, it is passed in _this variable. Since Arma 3 v.1.63.137807 the EH handle is also stored in _thisEventHandler variable and is available during EH code execution.

BIS_fnc_playerSideFaction.description: Return representative faction of the given side. Faction of the first detected player is used.

arrayIntersect.description: Intersects array1 with array2 returning array of unique common elements. Additionally, using the same array for array1 and array2 will simply return array of unique elements. Intersects only 1st dimension of an array.

curatorWaypointCost.description: Return current price for placing waypoints (curator specific).

ctRemoveRows.description: Takes array of row indices as a parameter and removes rows with those indices. Indices of remaining rows will be recomputed.

addMagazineGlobal.description: Adds a magazine to the unit. Note: You may create invalid combinations by adding more magazines than the free space in unit's inventory allows. When doing so, application behaviour is undefined.

loadBackpack.description: Returns current sum of mass from items stored in a backpack.

enableAimPrecision.description: Set whether animation's aim precision affects weapon sway.

BIS_fnc_showCuratorFeedbackMessage.description: Show feedback message when illegal operation is attempted in curator interface.

getPosVisual.description: Returns an object's rendered 3D position (z value above sea when over sea, or above ground when over land) in render time scope. Alias of visiblePosition.

velocityModelSpace.example: velocityModelSpace _chopper; comment "Returns [X (left(-) right(+)), Y (backward(-) forward(+)), Z (down(-) up(+))]";
velocityModelSpace.description: Returns the velocity (speed vector) of the vehicle as an array with format [x, y, z]. Vector is in model space.

difficulty.description: Returns high-level selected difficulty mode. Returned value will be: 0 (Recruit), 1 (Regular), 2 (Veteran) or 3 (Elite)

BIS_fnc_runLater.example: //Hints current game time in the next frame after 5 seconds have passed ["uniqueId", { hint str time; }, 5] call BIS_fnc_runLater;
BIS_fnc_runLater.description: Stack code/function that should be run later, after some time/frames or/and custom condition.

setPilotLight.description: Switches headlights of a vehicle on/off. Note that the vehicle has to be local, for global variant use Arma 3 Actions "LightOn"/"LightOff"

BIS_fnc_importImageLinks.description: Imports CfgVehicles image links from Community Wiki (https://community.bistudio.com/).

setUnitTrait.description: Enables or disables a trait or alters a trait of the given unit. Custom trait can only be a bool.

deleteVehicleCrew.description: Deletes a member of the crew of a vehicle. Human players cannot be deleted.

getPilotCameraPosition.description: Returns model space coordinates of the object airplane or helicopter pilotCamera .

visibleCompass.description: Checks if the player has compass opened and visible

vehicleCargoEnabled.example: Blackfish (Vehicle Transport) with given variable name blackfish _canTransportVehicles = vehicleCargoEnabled blackfish; //returns true
vehicleCargoEnabled.description: Check if the vehicle has enabled transporting other vehicles or not.

BIS_fnc_moduleSector.description: /* Description: Initialize a sector module. Can be also used to get sector parameters. --- Get all sectors --- Parameter(s): 0: BOOL Returns: ARRAY of OBJECTs --- Get number of sectors held by a side --- Parameter(s): 0: SIDE Returns: NUMBER - number of sectors owned by the side --- Set sector owner --- Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - sector module 1: SIDE Returns: BOOL --- Initialize --- Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - sector module Returns: NOTHING */

selectMin.description: Returns the array element with minimum numerical value. Engine solution to BIS_fnc_lowestNum and BIS_fnc_findExtreme. Therefore it is expected that supplied array consists of Numbers only. Booleans however are also supported and will be evaluated as Numbers: true - 1, false - 0. nil value treated as 0. Other non Number elements (not recommended) will be evaluated as 0 and Bad conversion: scalar message will be logged into .rpt.

BIS_fnc_timeToString.description: This function returns a 24-hour time as a string from a decimal

BIS_fnc_initRespawnBackpack.description: Init respawn backpack. Whover "assembles" it will receive a new respawn position. When backpack object has 'respawnNearbyPlayers' attribute set to 1, nearby player will receive the respawn as well.

BIS_fnc_fatigueEffect.description: Effects for high fatigue values. Internal engine use only, as it relies on internal BIS_* variables.

terrainIntersectAtASL.description: Checks for intersection of terrain between two ASL positions. Same as terrainIntersectASL, only returns intersect position instead of Boolean

BIS_fnc_VRDrawGrid.description: Visualizes surface grid (used primarily for VR missions).

BIS_fnc_moduleBootcampStage.description: /* Description: Change the current Stage in Bootcamp MP Guided Mode Parameter(s): http://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Arma_3_Modules Returns: NONE */ // Parameters

showScoretable.description: Forces the score table to be shown, hidden or reset to default functionality. Forcing score table will make it show even in SP. When score table is forced opened it cannot be closed manually, when it is force closed, it cannot be opened manually.

addPlayerScores.description: MP server only: Adds player score.

getPosATLVisual.description: Returns an object's rendered 3D position ATL (z value above ground) in render time scope.

setStatValue.description: Sets a value to a given stat.

synchronizedTriggers.description: Returns the list of triggers synchronized with a given waypoint.

BIS_fnc_credits_movieConfig.description: /* File: fn_credits_movieConfig.sqf Description: Movie credits config preprocessor. Parameter(s): _this select 0: Number - Index of item in config (CfgCredits >> CreditsMovie >> item) Returned value: _array: Array _array select 0: String - Position name (and tags) as structured text. _array select 1: String - Names (and tags) as structured text. _array select 2: Number - Required space coeficient (numberOfNames * textSizeCoef), -1 if config entry doesn't exist */

BIS_fnc_radialRedOut.description: Removes red radial postprocess (fire damage) created by BIS_fnc_radialRed.

removeHandgunItem.description: Removes given weapon item from the handgun weapon cargo space.

BIS_fnc_nearestRoad.description: Find the nearest road segment to certain position, within given radius.

BIS_fnc_createObjectOO.description: Instantiates an object of a certain class.

setPylonLoadOut.syntax: vehicle setPylonLoadOut [pylon name/index, magazine name, forced, turret];
setPylonLoadOut.description: Will add missile to vehicle pylon, TransportPylonsComponent in config is required

BIS_fnc_diagKeyLayout.description: /* Description: Exports default key layout to wiki template. Parameter(s): _this select 0: STRING - category, can be one of following "" - all controls in game "All" "BasicInfantryControls" "Car" "Air" "Helicopter" "Submarine" "Buldozer" "UserActions" _this select 1: STRING - selection method, can be one of following "" - single tap "double" - double tap "LCtrl" - with left control pressed "RCtrl" - with right control pressed "LShift" - with left shift pressed "RShift" - with right shift pressed Returns: STRING - wiki export text (also copied to clipboard) */

enableRopeAttach.description: Enable/disable ability to attach or be attached to ropes for given vehicle

BIS_fnc_indicateBleeding.description: Shows a PP effect which indicates bleeding.

removeOwnedMine.description: Removes ownership over a remotely detonatable mine from the unit.

tvSetData.description: Sets string data to item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

BIS_fnc_addCuratorChallenge.description: /* Description: Add challenges for curator to complete Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - curator 1 (Optional): ARRAY - list of supported challenges from CfgCuratorChallenges (default: all challenges) 2 (Optional): NUMBER - number of added challenges (default: 3) 3 (Optional): CODE - condition for challenges to remain active {default: true} 4 (optional): CODE or [CODE,STRING] - code executed upon completing all challenges and reward description Arguments passed to the code are: 0: OBJECT - curator 1: NUMBER - number of previously completed challenges by given curator 2: STRING - parent task ID 5 (Optional): STRING - parent task ID Returns: STRING - ID of parent task under which all challenge tasks are */

isEqualTypeParams.example: [1,2,player,"10"] isEqualTypeParams [0,0,objNull,""]; //true 123 isEqualTypeParams [0,0,objNull,""]; //false [] isEqualTypeParams [0,0,objNull,""]; //false [1,2,player] isEqualTypeParams [0,0,objNull,""]; //false [1,2,player,"10",true] isEqualTypeParams [0,0,nil,""]; //true [1,2,getPos player,"10",true] isEqualTypeParams [0,0,nil,""]; //true
isEqualTypeParams.description: Compares types of all elements of input array to types of all elements of template array. Similar to isEqualTypeArray however this command is designed for fast validation of functions params, so there are differences:

BIS_fnc_tridentSetRelationship.description: Set relationship of competing Trident sides. When the value reaches threshold, side relationship will change. The value slowly decreases towards 0.

addCuratorEditableObjects.description: Register objects which can be edited by a curator.

BIS_fnc_drawCuratorLocations.description: /* Description: Label every vilage, town and city in curator interface Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - curator module Returns: BOOL */

BIS_fnc_adjustSimpleObject.syntax: [object, [class, model, reversed, verticalOffset, animAdjustments, selectionToHide]] call BIS_fnc_adjustSimpleObject
BIS_fnc_adjustSimpleObject.description: Adjust simple object vertical position, animations and selection according to provided data.

shownHUD.description: Returns array of Booleans corresponding to the visibility of various HUD elements (see extended showHUD).

swimInDepth.description: Sets the target depth level for swimming soldier. Depth should be a negative number.

BIS_fnc_taskCreate.example: [civilian,["task1"],["Do this and you get a cookie","Earn Cookie","cookiemarker"],[0,0,0],1,2,true] call BIS_fnc_taskCreate
BIS_fnc_taskCreate.syntax: [owner, taskID, description, destination, state, priority, showNotification, type, visibleIn3D] call BIS_fnc_taskCreate

setCollisionLight.description: Switches collision lights of a vehicle on/off. Note that the vehicle has to be local.

backpackCargo.description: Get array with backpacks from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container).

removeMusicEventHandler.description: Removes specified music track event handler.

removeAllItemsWithMagazines.description: Removes all itemsWithMagazines from the uniform, vest and backpack.

incapacitatedState.description: Returns the incapacitated state of the given unit.

BIS_fnc_blackIn.description: Unregister a black screen. When none other black screen is registered, fade it out.

configSourceModList.description: Returns an array of mods (CfgMods) in which the given config class is defined.

setObjectMaterialGlobal.description: Set the material of the given selection on all computers in a network session.

ctHeaderCount.description: Returns number of headers (rows not included) in the RscControlsTable.

BIS_fnc_respawnTickets.example: Add 5 tickets for BLUFOR [west, 5] call BIS_fnc_respawnTickets;
BIS_fnc_respawnTickets.description: Manage respawn tickets used by Tickets respawn template. When player dies, number of tickets is decreased by 1. The most local tickets are always used. Example: When you first add tickets to player's side, they will be affected. If you later define tickets also to player's group, they will completely replace the side tickets. When player runs out of the tickets, his respawn is disabled. If you use also EndMission respawn template, the mission will automatically end once tickets in all name spaces are exhausted.

disableCollisionWith.description: Disable collision between vehicles. This command doesn't disable collision between PhysX objects.

BIS_fnc_paramDaytime.description: Sets time of the day to the hour. Minutes will always be zero.

enableDynamicSimulationSystem.description: Enables or disables the whole Arma_3_Dynamic_Simulation system

magazinesDetailVest.description: Returns an array with the type names of all the unit's vest magazines.

BIS_fnc_drawCuratorDeaths.description: Show skull unit for curator when the unit dies.

BIS_fnc_exportCfgMagazines.description: /* Description: Export list of addons for Community Wiki http://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Category:Arma_3:_Assets Parameter(s): 0: ARRAY of STRINGs - list of CfgPatches classes Returns: BOOL */

BIS_fnc_exportCfgWeapons.description: Export list of weapons for Community Wiki.

unassignCurator.description: Unassign curator (will destroy both sides of connection).

BIS_fnc_moduleTaskSetDestination.description: /* Description: Set Task Destination module function */

clearItemPool.description: Removes all items from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container)

getDLCs.description: Returns array of appIDs of DLCs. A list of all official DLCs:

playableSlotsNumber.description: Returns the number of available slots in mission per side (both empty and taken).

simulCloudDensity.description: Returns density of clouds at given position.

BIS_fnc_taskSetCurrent.description: Set a task to current. Identical to assigning a task.

BIS_fnc_setCuratorAttributes.description: /* Description: Set which attributes are available for given entity or entity type. Parameter(s): 0: OBJECT - curator 1: STRING - general setting for all entities of the given type, can be "object", "player", "group', "waypoint" or "marker" OBJECT - setting for specific object, overrides general settings GROUP - setting for specific group, overrides general settings 2: ARRAY of STRINGs - attributes object: Skill UnitPos Rank Damage Fuel Lock RespawnVehicle RespawnPosition Exec group: GroupID Behaviour Formation waypoint: Behaviour Formation marker: MarkerText MarkerColor Returns: BOOL */

BIS_fnc_preload.description: Start automatic loading screen upon mission start. On client, it will finish only when server is finished.

BIS_fnc_showCuratorAttributes.description: Show attributes window of an entity. When no attributes are available, no window is opened.

tvCurSel.description: Returns path to currently selected item. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

BIS_fnc_isCampaign.description: Checks to see if a mission is being run in a campaign.

BIS_fnc_isInsideArea.example: _center = getPos player; _size = [ 5, 5 ]; _checkPos = getPos player; //Check an area, centered on the player that is 10m wide and 10m tall _inArea = [ _center, _size, _checkPos ] call BIS_fnc_isInsideArea;
BIS_fnc_isInsideArea.description: Detects whether a position is within a square area of given size about center.

BIS_fnc_diagBulletCam.description: Add a "bullet camera" to shots fired by the specified unit.

BIS_fnc_updatePlayerArray.description: Updates dead player objects to their current respawned objects.

BIS_fnc_addRespawnInventory.description: Add a respawn inventory for respawn menu. Available loadouts are defined in CfgRespawnInventory in Description.ext.

BIS_fnc_enemyTargets.description: Return list of nearby enemy targets for given unit.

BIS_fnc_wpArtillery.syntax: [group, position, target, firedRounds, type] call BIS_fnc_wpArtillery
BIS_fnc_wpArtillery.description: Let group members fire artillery barrage on waypoint position. Units must have magazine type.

BIS_fnc_randomPos.description: Selects random position according to given params within given area

handgunMagazine.description: Returns either single element array, containing class name of currently loaded in the handgun magazine, or an empty array if unit has no handgun or handgun is not loaded. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

BIS_fnc_phoneticalWord.description: Convert integer to NATO phonetical alphabet word (e.g. 2 becomes "Bravo") or letter of alphabet.

attachedTo.example: if (isNull attachedTo _obj1) then { hint "_obj1 is not attached to anything."; };
attachedTo.description: Returns the object it is attached to.

BIS_fnc_missionHandlers.description: #define VAR_RELOADS (missionname + "_reloads_" + str ismultiplayer) //--- Mission end type and rating

joinString.example: _str = "- This, is a sample string." splitString "-,. "; // ["This","is","a","sample","string"] _str joinString " "; // "This is a sample string"
joinString.description: Joins array into String with provided separator. Array can be of mixed types, all elements will be converted to String prior to joining, but the fastest operation is on the array of Strings.

selectMax.description: Returns the array element with maximum numerical value. Engine solution to BIS_fnc_greatestNum and BIS_fnc_findExtreme. Therefore it is expected that supplied array consists of Numbers only. Booleans however are also supported and will be evaluated as Numbers: true - 1, false - 0. nil value treated as 0. Other non Number elements (not recommended) will be evaluated as 0 and Bad conversion: scalar message will be logged into .rpt.

setConvoySeparation.description: Sets the distance to keep to the vehicle which is in front.

magazineCargo.description: Get array with magazines from ammo box (or any general weapon holder container).

BIS_fnc_moduleEffectsFire.description: Creates fire on position of module (called usually by BIS_fnc_moduleEffectsEmitterCreator).

getAllSoundControllers.description: Returns an array containing names and values of the sound controllers that can be used in simple expressions when configuring sounds.

enableVehicleSensor.example: vehicle player enableVehicleSensor ["PassiveRadarSensorComponent",false]; // disables passive radar

getPilotCameraDirection.description: Returns model space vector of the object airplane or helicopter pilotCamera .

isFlashlightOn.description: Returns true if there is a linked and enabled flashlight on a given weapon.

BIS_fnc_respawnRounds.description: /* Description: Disable respawn until players of only one side (including its allies) remains, then respawn everyone at once. When "Rounds" respawn is used by only one side, wait until all its players are dead. Parameter(s): BOOL - true to force round end SIDE - use any side to return side affected by round system (based on description.ext respawnTemplates settings) ARRAY - empty array to return if a round is still on (players of more than one involved faction are alive) */

curatorRegisteredObjects.description: Returns array with all objects that has curator registered and their settings.

getMass.description: Returns mass of a PhysX object.

BIS_fnc_addWeapon.example: newGun = [player, "arifle_SDAR_F", 6] call BIS_fnc_addWeapon; // Adds 6 dual-purpose magazines and the underwater gun to the player.
BIS_fnc_addWeapon.description: Adds a weapon to the specified unit, with magazine classnames taken from the weapon's config (in CfgWeapons). This function does not remove magazines nor weapons prior to adding the new weapon, so that still has to be done manually.

waypointForceBehaviour.description: Returns true if the waypoint behavior is forced.

BIS_fnc_drawAO.example: [Trigger1] call BIS_fnc_drawAO; // Draws a dashed line around trigger1's outer edge, with 50m between each line.
BIS_fnc_drawAO.description: Draws a dashed line around the outer edges of a trigger.

add3DENConnection.example: add3DENConnection ["RandomStart",get3DENSelected "Object","marker_0"] Set random start on marker "marker_0" for all selected objects.

isGroupDeletedWhenEmpty.description: Checks if the given group marked for auto-deletion when empty. See deleteGroupWhenEmpty.

BIS_fnc_removeStackedEventHandler.description: Removes a stacked event handler with specified custom id.

objectFromNetId.description: Get object with given unique ID. If object is a group use groupFromNetId. As this command is MP only, you can use BIS_fnc_objectFromNetId, which extends the use to SP as well.

setCuratorEditingAreaType.description: Set whether curator can edit in all editing areas (true) or outside of them (false).

detectedMines.description: Returns an array of all mines detected by a given side

language.example: _myLanguage = language; // will return "English" if game language is set to English

animateDoor.description: Animates a door on a vehicle. Animation is defined in config file in CfgVehicles -> AnimationSources. Wanted animation phase is set with phase param.
